iaformaplus.name: IAFormaPlus
iaformaplus.description: Artificial intelligence training platform with course management system, progress tracking and automated certification. Modern interface and optimal user experience.

orhakerem.name: Orhakerem
orhakerem.description: Elegant showcase website for law firm, highlighting legal expertise with professional design and intuitive navigation for potential clients.

pinckit.name: PinckIt
pinckit.description: Collaborative management web application allowing teams to plan, track and optimize their projects with innovative visual tools and personalized dashboards.

template.title: Ready-to-Use Templates
template.description: Explore our collection of professional templates designed for different business sectors. Each template is optimized for conversion and can be customized to your needs.

bakery.name: Bakery Template
bakery.description: Elegant template specially designed for artisan bakeries. Showcases your creations with a mouth-watering photo gallery, online ordering system and opening hours display.

florist.name: Florist Template
florist.description: Fresh and colorful design for florists. Bouquet catalog with filters, event booking system and social media integration to share your creations.

computerRepair.name: Computer Repair Template
computerRepair.description: Modern interface for computer repair services. Appointment scheduling system, real-time repair tracking and detailed FAQ section for common issues.

pastryShop.name: Pastry Shop Template
pastryShop.description: Gourmet showcase for high-end pastry shops. Refined presentation of your creations, pre-order system for events and integrated blog to share your recipes and news.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SiteKept is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our website and services.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.content: We may collect and process the following data:
items: Identification information: first name, last name, email address
Contact information: phone number, postal address
Professional information: company name, business sector
Browsing data: IP address, browser type, pages visited
Technical data: cookies, session identifiers

purposeOfProcessing.title: Purpose of Processing
purposeOfProcessing.content: Your personal data is used to:
items: Provide and improve our services
Respond to your requests and communications
Manage your customer account
Send you information about our services
Ensure the security of our website
Comply with our legal obligations

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: The processing of your data is based on:
items: Your explicit consent
Contract execution
Compliance with legal obligations
Our legitimate interests

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We never sell your personal data. We may share your information only with:
items: Our technical service providers
Competent authorities upon legal request
Our partners with your explicit consent

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, in accordance with applicable legislation.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or alteration.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectify inaccurate data
Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to restrict processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing
Right to withdraw consent

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our site uses cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: If we transfer your data outside the European Economic Area, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this page with an updated date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this policy or your personal data, please contact us:

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.content: If you believe your rights have not been respected, you can file a complaint with your local data protection authority.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using SiteKept's services, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: SiteKept offers professional website creation services, including:
items: Design and development of showcase websites
SEO and performance optimization
Hosting and technical maintenance
Customer support and updates
Domain name (free for the first year)

clientObligations.title: Client Obligations
clientObligations.content: As a client, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information
Meet content delivery deadlines
Not use our services for illegal purposes
Respect intellectual property rights
Make payments according to agreed terms
Collaborate in good faith in project completion

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
items: Once full payment is made, you become the owner of your website
The source code is fully transferred to you
Content (text, images) you provide remains your property
SiteKept retains the right to use the project in its portfolio
Third-party technologies remain subject to their respective licenses

pricing.title: Pricing and Payments
items: Prices are quoted in euros, all taxes included
A 30% deposit is required to start the project
The balance is due upon site delivery
Payments are made by bank transfer or credit card
Late payments incur penalties of 10% per month

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
items: Guaranteed delivery in 48h for standard showcase sites
Deadlines start from receipt of deposit and content
Complex projects have specific timelines
Delays caused by the client are not attributable to SiteKept
In case of delay on our part, a 5% discount per day is applied

warranties.title: Warranties and Support
items: 6-month warranty on proper functioning
Free bug fixes during the warranty period
Email technical support included for 3 months
Site usage training included
Critical security updates for 1 year

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
items: SiteKept is not liable for indirect or consequential losses
Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service
We do not guarantee the commercial results of the site
Service interruptions due to third parties are not our responsibility
The client is responsible for content published on their site

termination.title: Termination
items: Client may cancel within 7 days of signing
Beyond that, the deposit remains with SiteKept
In case of serious breach, either party may terminate with notice
Work completed remains due even in case of termination
Termination does not affect acquired rights

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law
applicableLaw.content: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Paris. The parties agree to attempt an amicable resolution before any legal action.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: SiteKept reserves the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Modifications apply to new contracts only. Existing clients remain subject to the terms accepted at signing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use:
contact.address: Address: SiteKept, 123 Avenue des Champs, 75008 Paris, France

domainPolicy.title: Domain Name Policy
domainPolicy.content: Regarding the domain name offered for the first year:
items: The domain name is registered in the client's name
SiteKept manages initial registration and renewal for the first year
After the first year, the client is responsible for renewal
Renewal fees are the client's responsibility
Transfer to another registrar is possible at any time
